author: fitz
msg: * export-cmd.c (svn_cl__export): Accept 1 or 2 args. If we get only 1
arg, use the last component of the URL for the local directory name.
* main.c (svn_cl__cmd_table): Doc fix for export cmd.

author: kfogel
msg: Start regression tests for "svn merge".  They don't work yet -- see my
possibly ignorant rant in a comment in the new file -- but in the
process of writing them I've tested enough merges to know that we're
safe to close issue #662, and to start work on issue #728.
(basic_merging_update): Renamed basic_merge because the old name

author: naked
msg: Make svn_time_from_nts return an error instead of the value
directly. Also a minor fix to keep svn_time_from_nts from crashing if
(svn_time_from_nts): Changed interface to return an error.
(find_matching_string): Added size argument for max size. No longer
crashes if a string cannot be found.
(get_time): Adapt for svn_time_from_nts returning an error.
(svn_wc__timestamps_equal_p): Commented out time to string and back
